sentences.en: "Good lord, that's what he is: he's a policeman."
A policeman accidentally killed his two best friends with a single bullet.
sentences.cn: 一名警察不慎一枪打死了他的两个挚友。

sentences.en: A policeman has been shot dead in an ambush.
sentences.cn: 一名警察在一次伏击中中弹身亡。

sentences.en: A policeman held his gun in both hands and barked an order.
sentences.cn: 警察双手握枪，厉声发出指令。

sentences.en: A policeman would not live one year if he obeyed these regulations.
sentences.cn: 警察如果遵守这些规定的话，一年都活不了。

sentences.en: Another policeman has been injured as fighting continued this morning.
sentences.cn: 今早又有一名警员在冲突中受伤。

sentences.en: He tried to corrupt the policeman with money.
sentences.cn: 他设法用金钱向警察行贿。

sentences.en: He tried to strangle a border policeman and steal his gun.
sentences.cn: 他企图勒死一名边防警察并偷走他的枪。

sentences.en: He was only five feet nine, the minimum height for a policeman.
sentences.cn: 他只有5英尺9英寸高，刚刚达到当警察的最低身高要求。

sentences.en: He was rugby tackled by a policeman after breaking through police lines.
sentences.cn: 他在突破警戒线后被一名警察拦截了。

sentences.en: I think he must be a policeman, he keeps fishing for information.
sentences.cn: 我想他肯定是警察，他不断地转弯抹角地打听消息。

sentences.en: Kenworthy had tried not to act the policeman.
sentences.cn: 肯沃西努力表现得不像个警察。

sentences.en: One policeman was clearly visible noting the number plates of passing cars.
sentences.cn: 能清楚地看到一名警察记下了经过车辆的车牌号。

sentences.en: One young policeman stood guard outside the locked embassy gates.
sentences.cn: 一位年轻的警察在大门紧闭的使馆外站岗。

sentences.en: Only three people, including a policeman, will be privy to the facts.
sentences.cn: 只会允许3个人，其中包括一名警察，了解这些内情。

sentences.en: The policeman smiled at her. "Pretty dog."— "Oh well, thank you."
sentences.cn: 警察冲她笑了笑，“这狗真漂亮。”——“哦，谢谢。”

sentences.en: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman.
sentences.cn: 小偷在警察的逼视下显得惶恐不安。

sentences.en: The two policemen were joined by another policeman also carrying a pistol.
sentences.cn: 另一名持枪警察和那两名警察会合了。

words.tran_cn: 警察，警员；[分化]淀帚（橡皮头玻璃搅棒）

trans.tran_cn: （男）警察，警员，看守矿井的人，[化] 淀帚
trans.tran_en: A policeman is a man who is a member of the police force
